name: Fort Calva(DEMO)
description:
This was my proof of concept for game I have been wanting to create for a long time. I started making this a few years ago when I bought RPG Maker XP(I am now mainly using RPG Maker MV) but I decided to fix some of bugs the game had and upload for others to play. 

It is a short game using the base assets of RPG Maker XP, this was my first full game I created so it will be rough around the edges. It is set in a Fantasy world of my creation.

Engine: RPG Maker XP

Length: Short(2 hours at the very most, can be beaten in less than a hour)

Contents: Fort Calva Demo, Readme, and XP RTP104e Package
